𒌴 ≈ 𒐈𒆕 ≈ 𒈫𒌇 ≈ 𒐈̲𒀸 <> 𒆕 𒌇

𒌴 UR₄ ≈ 𒅕 IR ≈ 𒀿

𒌴 GUR15 gur₁₅ grab < KUR

𒌴 UR4 UR₄ [612x] = to pluck; to gather, collect; to harvest

𒌴 ur₄ 𒄯 ur₅ 𒄯 ḪAR harvest "to pluck; to harvest" <> work slave

𒌴 gur₁₅ ≈ Schur in 𒂷𒇻𒌴 ĝa₂udu-ur₄ "Gatter" sheep-shearing shed

𒌴 ur₄ err 𒌨𒊒 𒌨 ur-ru-ur errar "to roam around"

𒌇 ≈ 𒁓 BUR ≈ 𒁉 beer 𒌇 ≈ 𒌴 gur15 ≈ 𒃼 gar

𒌴 gur₁₅ ≈ 𒂕 egir 𒁖

𒌇 ≈ 𒁓 BUR in Bergerie 𒂷𒇻𒌴 Woolshed
